templates.name: frontend-apps
templates.title: The frontend Apps of Queimadas
templates.description: The frontend Apps of Queimadas project used as Web View Apps.

templates.name: backend-apps
templates.title: The backend Apps of Queimadas.
templates.description: The backend Apps of Queimadas project used as tasks or APIs.

templates.name: proxy
templates.title: Nginx HTTP web server based services
templates.description: Includes the main http proxy and another instance for delivery static files.
templates.note: This stack is mandatory to provide the main proxy and delivery of files for download.

templates.name: pg-client
templates.title: The PgAdmin4 Web Client for PostgreSQL.
templates.description: The PgAdmin4 App allows to manage the databases into any internal instance for PostgreSQL.
templates.note: This stack is optional and serves to manage the databases used for publishing PRODES and DETER data by TerraBrasilis Applications.

templates.name: geoserver-cluster
templates.title: The GeoServer cluster to publish data compliant with the OGC services standard.
templates.description: The GeoServer application allows managing data sources and making them available through the OGC API as WMS and WFS services.
templates.note: This stack is mandatory and serves to manage the publication of data layers for TerraBrasilis databases.
